"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54420fe66368720b47930200#post_54420fe66368720b47930200
Naw, I think that'd be a little much so it can do a BIG chunk of damage. Given like the past Vs. games, damage can be listed in the thousands to millions, it can do a KO to any character who has 50% or less HP left. :) But it still is devastating. The scythe itself usually would be used in Light's normal attacks, Command Moves, Special Moves, and Hyper Combos other than Death Note, his Level 3.
